title: The Awakening
description: You find yourself in a strange new world, with no memory of how you arrived.

stage_1.description: You wake up in a clearing. A strange blue box floats before your eyes, displaying your stats.

choices.consequence: You see a small town in the distance.

stage_2.description: You approach the town. A guard stops you at the gate. 'Halt! Identify yourself.'

choices.consequence: The guard eyes you suspiciously but points you to the Magic Society.
The guard nods approvingly and points you to the Adventure Society.

stage_3_mage.description: You visit the Magic Society. An elder mage senses your potential and offers you a Magic Essence.

choices.consequence: You received a Magic Essence.

stage_3_warrior.description: You visit the Adventure Society. A veteran fighter sizes you up and offers you a Might Essence.

choices.consequence: You received a Might Essence.

title: The Monster Surge
description: Unusual monster activity is threatening the region.

stage_1.description: Reports are coming in of monsters attacking outlying farms. The Adventure Society is looking for volunteers.

choices.consequence: You are assigned to the western gate.
You are sent to track the beasts to their lair.

stage_2_defend.description: A wave of monsters attacks the gate! You fight bravely alongside the guards.

choices.consequence: You successfully repel the attack.

stage_2_hunt.description: You track the monsters to a cave. Inside, you find a broodmother.

choices.consequence: The monster threat is ended at its source.

stage_3_victory.description: The town is safe for now. The Mayor thanks you for your service.

choices.consequence: You receive a Rare Awakening Stone.

title: The Ancient Ruins
description: An ancient structure has been unearthed nearby.

stage_1.description: Excavators have found a ruin that predates the current era. They need explorers.

choices.consequence: The air inside is stale and heavy with magic.

stage_2.description: You encounter a sealed door with a complex puzzle lock.

choices.consequence: You smash the lock, triggering a trap but opening the door.
The door slides open silently.

stage_3_brute.description: You find a pedestal with a glowing artifact, but the room is collapsing!

choices.consequence: You escape with the artifact.

stage_3_smart.description: You find a pedestal with a glowing artifact. The room is pristine.

choices.consequence: You claim the artifact safely.

title: The Lost Cat
description: Mrs. Higgins has lost her cat, Mittens.

stage_1.description: Mrs. Higgins is crying. 'Mittens ran into the forest!'

choices.consequence: You search the nearby woods.

stage_2.description: You find Mittens stuck in a tree.

choices.consequence: You rescue the cat. Mrs. Higgins gives you a potion.

stage_1.description: The alchemist asks you to find 5 bundles of Moonleaf.

choices.consequence: The glade is full of herbs.

stage_2.description: You find the Moonleaf, but a wolf guards it.

choices.consequence: You defeat the wolf and collect the herbs.

title: The Duel
description: A rival adventurer has challenged you.

stage_1.description: Garret, a pompous noble, challenges you to a duel for honor.

choices.consequence: You meet him in the square.
He laughs at you.
You knock him down. He yields.
You lost reputation.
